title: How many world series did Ricky Henderson win? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rickey Henderson appeared for the following World Series winners: Oakland Athletics (1989)Toronto Blue Jays (1993).

He was an outfielder on the 1989 Oakland A's world series championship team, and he was part of the 1993 Toronto Blue Jays world series winning team also Rickey Henderson Stats | Baseball-Reference.com
